articles.author: Isabella O'Malley, Amelia Thomson-DeVeaux
articles.title: How extreme cold is affecting Americans’ lives, according to a new AP-NORC poll - AP News
articles.description: A new AP-NORC poll shows more Americans say extreme cold has affected their lives after frigid weather engulfed much of North America at the beginning of 2026. The survey found that 57% of U.S. adults report severe cold or winter storms in the past five years…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Millions in North America kicked off 2026 with bitterly cold temperatures, with many saying its been years since theyve experienced such frigid winter weather.
Pipes that never froze… [+6724 chars]
